GK16simhrsku:1: The Rasārṇava-sudhākara of Siṃhabhūpāla. Critically edited with introduction and notes by T. Venkatacharya. Madras:
GK16simhrsku:21: tasya bhāryā mahābhāgyā viṣṇoḥ śrīr iva viśrutā /
GK16simhrsku:27: kalāv eka-pado dharmo yair ebhiś caraṇair iva /
GK16simhrsku:30: namatām unnatiś citraṃ rājñām anamatāṃ natiḥ //SRs_1.11//
GK16simhrsku:33: ānṛṇya samapādi yena vibhunā tat-tad-guṇair ātmano
GK16simhrsku:43: so' yaṃ siṃha-mahīpālo vasudeva iti sphuṭam /
GK16simhrsku:53: sodaryo balabhadra-mūrtir aniśaṃ devī priyā rukmiṇī
GK16simhrsku:55: so' yaṃ śrīpatir annapota-nṛpatiḥ kiṃ cānanāmbhoruhe
GK16simhrsku:72: khaḍge khaḍge phalita-vapuṣaṃ yaṃ purastād vilokya /
GK16simhrsku:73: pratyāvṛttā api tata ito vīkṣamāṇā yadīyaṃ
GK16simhrsku:79: tayor abhūtāṃ putrau dvāv ādyo veda-girīśvaraḥ /
GK16simhrsku:80: dvitīyas tv advitīyo' sau yaśasā siṃha-bhūpatiḥ //SRs_1.26//
GK16simhrsku:84: bali-dhvaṃsī bāṇaḥ para-puram anekaṃ ca viṣayaḥ /
GK16simhrsku:86: maheśo' yaṃ siṃha-kṣitipa iti yaṃ jalpati janaḥ //SRs_1.28//
GK16simhrsku:92: kalāḥ kāntāḥ puṣṇan dadhad api ca jaivātṛka-kathām /
GK16simhrsku:93: nitāntaṃ yo rājā prakaṭayati mitrodayam aho
GK16simhrsku:95: tal-labdhāni ghanāghanair atitarāṃ vārāṃ pṛṣanty ambudhau
GK16simhrsku:96: svātyām eva hi śuktikāsu dadhate muktāni muktātmatām /
GK16simhrsku:97: yad dānodaka-vipruṣas tu sudhiyāṃ haste patantyo' bhavan
GK16simhrsku:98: māṇikyāni mahāmbarāṇi bahuśo dhāmāni hemāni ca //SRs_1.31//
GK16simhrsku:103: prāṇānāṃ parirakṣaṇāya bahuśo vṛttiṃ madīyāṃ gatās
GK16simhrsku:106: manye yasya dṛg-antayoḥ parisaraṃ sā kāma-dhenuḥ śritā //SRs_1.33//
GK16simhrsku:108: ity antaḥ-pura-pṛcchayā yad ariṣu prāpteṣu lajjā-vaśam /
GK16simhrsku:122: satyoktau caturagrajaṃ vitaraṇe kiṃ cāpi pañcāgrajam //SRs_1.37//
GK16simhrsku:131: etair anyaiś ca tanayaiḥ so' yaṃ siṃha-mahīpatiḥ /
GK16simhrsku:135: satāṃ ca rakṣām asatāṃ ca śikṣāṃ
GK16simhrsku:142: kauṭilyaṃ cikureṣu kiṃ ca kṛśatā madhye paraṃ badhyate //SRs_1.43//
GK16simhrsku:147: bhagavan śrotum icchāmaḥ śrāvyaṃ dṛśyaṃ manoharam /
GK16simhrsku:150: iti pṛṣṭaḥ sa tair brahmā sarva-vedān anusmaran //SRs_1.47//
GK16simhrsku:151: tebhyaś ca sāram ādāya nāṭya-vedam athāsṛjat /
GK16simhrsku:153: saha putrair imaṃ vedaṃ prayogeṇa prakāśaya /
GK16simhrsku:154: iti tena niyuktas tu bharataḥ saha sūnubhiḥ //SRs_1.49//
GK16simhrsku:157: tathā tad-anusāreṇa śāṇḍilyaḥ kohalo' pi ca /
GK16simhrsku:158: dattilaś ca mataṅgaś ca ye cānye tat-tanūdbhavāḥ //SRs_1.51//
GK16simhrsku:159: granthān nānā-vidhāṃś cakruḥ prakhyātās te mahītale /
GK16simhrsku:167: bālaḥ kiṃ kamalākarān dina-maṇir nollāsayed añjasā
GK16simhrsku:168: tat sampraty api mādṛśām api vacaḥ syād eva samprītaye //SRs_1.55//
GK16simhrsku:173: rasotkarṣo hi nāṭyasya prāṇās tat sa nirūpyate /
GK16simhrsku:175: ānīyamānaḥ svādutvaṃ sthāyī bhāvo rasaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GK16simhrsku:177: budhair jñeyo' yam ālamba uddīpana iti dvidhā /
GK16simhrsku:179: ālambanaṃ mataṃ tatra nāyako guṇavān pumān /
GK16simhrsku:181: aujjvalyaṃ dhārmikatvaṃ ca kulīnatvaṃ ca vāgmitā /
GK16simhrsku:184: ete sādhāraṇāḥ proktāḥ nāyakasya guṇā budhaiḥ //SRs_1.63//
GK16simhrsku:200: uktair guṇaiś ca sakalair yuktaḥ syād uttamo netā //SRs_1.71//
GK16simhrsku:202: netā caturvidho' sau dhīrodāttaś ca dhīra-lalitaś ca //SRs_1.72//
GK16simhrsku:208: gāmbhīryam avikāraḥ syāt saty api kṣobha-kāraṇe //SRs_1.75//
GK16simhrsku:217: patiś copapatiś caiva vaiśikaś ceti bhedataḥ /
GK16simhrsku:218: patis tu vidhinā pāṇigrāhakaḥ kathyate budhaiḥ //SRs_1.80//
GK16simhrsku:219: caturdhā so' pi kathito vṛttyā kāvya-vicakṣaṇaiḥ /
GK16simhrsku:220: anukūlaḥ śaṭho dhṛṣṭo dakṣiṇaś ceti bhedataḥ //SRs_1.81//
GK16simhrsku:223: nāyikāsv apy anekāsu tulyo dakṣiṇa ucyate /
GK16simhrsku:224: laṅghitācārayā yas tu vināpi vidhinā striyā //SRs_1.83//
GK16simhrsku:225: saṅketaṃ nīyate prokto budhair upapatis tu saḥ /
GK16simhrsku:233: veśyopabhoga-rasiko yo bhavet sa tu vaiśikaḥ /
GK16simhrsku:238: nāyakānucaro bhaktaḥ kiñcid ūnaś ca tad-guṇaiḥ //SRs_1.90//
GK16simhrsku:247: svakīyā parakīyā ca sāmānyā ceti sā tridhā /
GK16simhrsku:248: sampat-kāle vipat-kāle yā na muñcati vallabham //SRs_1.95//
GK16simhrsku:250: sā ca svīyā tridhā mugdhā madhyā prauḍheti kathyate //SRs_1.96//
GK16simhrsku:251: mugdhā nava-vayaḥ-kāmā ratau vāmā mṛduḥ krudhi /
GK16simhrsku:254: apriyaṃ vā priyaṃ vāpi na kiñcid api bhāṣate //SRs_1.98//
GK16simhrsku:258: dhīrā tu vakti vakroktyā sotprāsaṃ sāgasaṃ priyam //SRs_1.100//
GK16simhrsku:259: adhīrā paruṣair vākyaiḥ khedayed vallabhaṃ ruṣā /
GK16simhrsku:260: dhīrādhīra tu vakroktyā sa-bāṣpaṃ vadati priyam //SRs_1.101//
GK16simhrsku:265: udāste surate dhīrā sāvahitthā ca sādarā /
GK16simhrsku:266: santarjya niṣṭhuraṃ roṣād adhīrā tāḍayet priyam //SRs_1.104//
GK16simhrsku:268: dvedhā jyeṣṭhā kaniṣṭheti madhyā prauḍhāpi tādṛśī //SRs_1.105//
GK16simhrsku:271: mugdhā tv eka-vidhā caivaṃ sā trayodaśadhoditā /
GK16simhrsku:272: anyāpi dvividhā kanyā paroḍhā ceti bhedataḥ //SRs_1.107//
GK16simhrsku:273: tatra kanyā tv anūḍhā syāt sa-lajjā pitṛ-pālitā /
GK16simhrsku:275: pradhānam apradhānaṃ vā nāṭakādāv iyaṃ bhavet /
GK16simhrsku:280: eṣā syād dvividhā raktā viraktā ceti bhedataḥ //SRs_1.111//
GK16simhrsku:281: tatra raktā tu varṇyā syād aprādhānyena nāṭake /
GK16simhrsku:284: sā ced divyā nāṭake tu prādhānyenaiva varṇyate //SRs_1.113//
GK16simhrsku:288: rakteva rañjayed ibhyān niḥsvān mātrā vivāsayet //SRs_1.115//
GK16simhrsku:292: ataś ca nāṭakādau tu varṇyā sā na bhaved iti /
GK16simhrsku:294: sāmānyā vanitā veśyā sā dravyaṃ param icchatā /
GK16simhrsku:295: guṇa-hīne ca na dveṣo nānurāgo guṇiny api /
GK16simhrsku:306: tās tu prāyeṇa dṛśyante sarvatra vyavahārataḥ /
GK16simhrsku:307: prathamaṃ proṣita-patikā vāska-sajjā tataś ca virahotkā //SRs_1.121//
GK16simhrsku:308: atha khaṇḍitā matā syāt kalahāntaritābhisārikā caiva /
GK16simhrsku:309: kathitā ca vipralabdhā svādhīna-patis tathā cānyā //SRs_1.122//
GK16simhrsku:315: bharatādayair abhidadhe strīṇām vāras tu vāsakaḥ //SRs_1.125//
GK16simhrsku:321: anāgasi priyatame cirayaty utsukā tu yā //SRs_1.128//
GK16simhrsku:323: asyās tu ceṣṭā hṛt-tāpo vepathuś cāṅga-sādanam //SRs_1.129//
GK16simhrsku:326: bhoga-lakṣmāñcitaḥ prātar āgacchet sā hi khaṇḍitā /
GK16simhrsku:327: asyās tu cintā niḥśvāsas tūṣṇīṃ-bhāvo' śru-mocanam //SRs_1.131//
GK16simhrsku:329: yā sakhīnāṃ puraḥ pāda-patitaṃ vallabhaṃ ruṣā //SRs_1.132//
GK16simhrsku:330: nirasya paścāt tapati kalahāntaritā hi sā /
GK16simhrsku:331: asyās tu bhrānti-saṃlāpau moho niḥśvasitaṃ jvaraḥ //SRs_1.133//
GK16simhrsku:332: muhuḥ pralāpa ity ādyā iṣṭāś ceṣṭā manīṣibhiḥ /
GK16simhrsku:335: svayaṃ vābhisared yā tu sā bhaved abhisārikā //SRs_1.135//
GK16simhrsku:342: mṛṣā priye tu nidrāṇe pārśve tiṣṭhati niścalā /
GK16simhrsku:361: kṛtvā saṅketam aprāpte daivād vyathitā tu yā //SRs_1.148//
GK16simhrsku:362: vipralabdheti sā proktā budhair asyās tu vikriyā /
GK16simhrsku:367: uttamā madhyamā nīcety evaṃ sarvāḥ striyas tridhā //SRs_1.151//
GK16simhrsku:368: abhijātair bhoga-tṛptair guṇibhir yā ca kāmyate /
GK16simhrsku:370: vidadhaty apriyaṃ patyau svayam ācarati priyam /
GK16simhrsku:371: vallabhe sāparādhe' pi tūṣṇīṃ tiṣṭhati sottamā //SRs_1.153//
GK16simhrsku:372: puṃsaḥ svayaṃ kāmayate kāmyate yā ca tair vadhūḥ /
GK16simhrsku:374: sāpakāre' pakartrī syāt snigdhe snihyati vallabhe /
GK16simhrsku:376: akasmāt kupyati ruṣaṃ prārthitāpi na muñcati /
GK16simhrsku:377: surūpaṃ vā kurūpaṃ vā guṇavantam athāguṇam //SRs_1.156//
GK16simhrsku:378: sthaviraṃ taruṇaṃ vāpi yā vā kāmayate muhuḥ /
GK16simhrsku:385: āsāṃ dūtyaḥ sakhī ceṭī liṅginī prativeśinī //SRs_1.160//
GK16simhrsku:386: dhātreyī śilpakārī ca kumārī kathinī tathā /
GK16simhrsku:392: sarvāsām api nārīṇāṃ yauvanaṃ tu caturvidham /
GK16simhrsku:402: nātirajyati kāntasya saṅgame kiṃ tu lajjate /
GK16simhrsku:403: stanau pīnau tanur madhyaḥ pāṇipādasya raktimā //SRs_1.169//
GK16simhrsku:405: nitambo vipulo nābhir gabhīrā jaghanaṃ ghanam //SRs_1.170//
GK16simhrsku:413: vicchāyatā khara-sparśo' py aṅgānāṃ ślathatā manāk //SRs_1.174//
GK16simhrsku:414: adhare masṛṇo rāgas tṛtīye yauvane bhavet /
GK16simhrsku:419: nirmāṃsatā ca bhavati caturthe yauvane striyāḥ //SRs_1.177//
GK16simhrsku:425: yena bhūṣitavad bhāti tad rūpam iti kathyate //SRs_1.180//
GK16simhrsku:427: pratibhāti yad aṅgeṣu lāvaṇyaṃ tad ihocyate //SRs_1.181//
GK16simhrsku:431: sārūpyaṃ nayati prājñair ābhirūpyaṃ tad ucyate //SRs_1.183//
GK16simhrsku:432: spṛṣṭaṃ yatrāṅgam aspṛṣṭam iva syān mārdavaṃ hi tat /
GK16simhrsku:436: na saheta kara-sparśaṃ yenāṅgaṃ madhyamaṃ hi tat /
GK16simhrsku:445: bhāvaṃ manogataṃ sākṣāt sva-hetuṃ vyañjayanti ye /
GK16simhrsku:448: tatra ca bhāvo hāvo helā śobhā kānti-dīptī ca //SRs_1.191//
GK16simhrsku:449: prāgalbhyaṃ mādhuryaṃ dhairyaudāryaṃ ca cittajā bhāvāḥ /
GK16simhrsku:452: bhāva īṣat-prakāśo yaḥ sa hāva iti kathyate //SRs_1.193//
GK16simhrsku:455: sā śobhā rūpa-bhogādyair yat syād aṅga-vibhūṣaṇam /
GK16simhrsku:461: sthirā cittonnatir yā tu tad dhairyam iti saṃjñitam /
GK16simhrsku:465: vihṛtaṃ ceti vijñeyā yoṣitāṃ daśa gātrajāḥ /
GK16simhrsku:467: ceṣṭitair gatibhir vā syāt sā līleti nigadyate /
GK16simhrsku:469: tātkāliko viśeṣo yaḥ sa vilāsa itīritaḥ /
GK16simhrsku:476: duḥkhiteva bahiḥ kupyed yatra kuṭṭamitaṃ hi tat //SRs_1.205//
GK16simhrsku:477: iṣṭe' py anādaro garvān mānād bibboka īritaḥ /
GK16simhrsku:480: īrṣyayā māna-lajjābhyāṃ na dattaṃ yogyam uttaram //SRs_1.207//
GK16simhrsku:481: kriyayā vyajyate yatra vihṛtaṃ tad udīritam /
GK16simhrsku:483: kathitāḥ sattvajāḥ strīṇām alaṅkārās tu viṃśatiḥ /
GK16simhrsku:484: sattvād daśaiva bhāvādyā jātā līlādayas tu na //SRs_1.209//
GK16simhrsku:485: ato hi viṃśatir bhāvāḥ sāttvikā iti nocitam /
GK16simhrsku:488: bhojena krīḍitaṃ kelir ity anyau gātrajau smṛtau //SRs_1.211//
GK16simhrsku:489: ato viṃśatir ity atra saṅkhyeyaṃ nopapadyate /
GK16simhrsku:491: ādyaḥ prāg eva bhāvādi-samutpatteś ca śaiśave /
GK16simhrsku:494: ato viṃśatir ity eṣā saṅkhyā saṅkhyāvatāṃ matā //SRs_1.214//
GK16simhrsku:495: śobhā vilāso mādhuryaṃ dhairyaṃ gāmbhīryam eva ca /
GK16simhrsku:497: nīce dayādhike spardhā śauryotsāhau ca dakṣatā /
GK16simhrsku:498: yatra prakaṭatāṃ yānti sā śobheti prakīrtitā //SRs_1.216//
GK16simhrsku:499: vṛṣabhasyeva gambhīrā gatir dhīraṃ ca darśanam /
GK16simhrsku:500: sasmitaṃ ca vaco yatra sa vilāsa itīritaḥ //SRs_1.217//
GK16simhrsku:502: śṛṅgāra-pracurā ceṣṭā yatra tal lalitaṃ bhavet //SRs_1.218//
GK16simhrsku:503: atra gāmbhīrya-dhairye dve cittaje gātrajāḥ pare /
GK16simhrsku:505: ālāpaś ca vilāpaś ca saṃlāpaś ca pralāpakaḥ /
GK16simhrsku:508: evaṃ dvādaśadhā proktā kīrtitā vāg-ārambhā vicakṣaṇaiḥ //SRs_1.221//
GK16simhrsku:509: tatrālāpaḥ priyoktiḥ syād vilāpo duḥkhajaṃ vacaḥ /
GK16simhrsku:511: vyarthālāpaḥ pralāpaḥ syād anulāpo muhur vacaḥ /
GK16simhrsku:514: so' tideśo mad-uktāni tad-uktānīti yad vacaḥ //SRs_1.224//
GK16simhrsku:515: nirdeśas tu bhavet so' yam aham ity ādi-bhāṣaṇam /
GK16simhrsku:520: rītiḥ syāt pada-vinyāsa-bhaṅgī sā tu tridhā matā //SRs_1.227//
GK16simhrsku:521: komalā kaṭhinā miśrā ceti syāt tatra komalā /
GK16simhrsku:528: ete vaidarbha-mārgasya prāṇā daśa guṇāḥ smṛtāḥ //SRs_1.231//
GK16simhrsku:530: śaithilyaṃ yatra na spṛṣṭaṃ sa śleṣaḥ samudāhṛtaḥ //SRs_1.232//
GK16simhrsku:533: bandho mṛduḥ sphuṭo miśra iti tredhā sa nigadyate /
GK16simhrsku:534: tan mādhuryaṃ bhaved yatra śabde' rthe ca sphuṭo rasaḥ //SRs_1.234//
GK16simhrsku:539: samāsa-bahulatvaṃ yat tad ojaḥ iti gīyate /
GK16simhrsku:541: kāntiḥ syād dvividhā khyātā vārtāyāṃ varṇanāsu ca /
GK16simhrsku:546: sā miśrā saiva pāñcālīty uktā tad-deśaja-priyā //SRs_1.240//
GK16simhrsku:547: āndhrī lāṭī ca saurāṣṭrīty ādayo miśra-rītayaḥ /
GK16simhrsku:553: bhāratī sātvatī caiva kaiśiky ārabhaṭīti ca /
GK16simhrsku:554: catasro vṛttayas tāsām utpattir vakṣyate sphuṭam //SRs_1.244//
GK16simhrsku:555: jagaty ekārṇave jāte bhagavān avyayaḥ pumān /
GK16simhrsku:563: tad imau naya durdharṣau nidhanaṃ tvarayā vibho /
GK16simhrsku:564: iti tasya vacaḥ śrutvā nijagāda janārdanaḥ //SRs_1.249//
GK16simhrsku:567: adhunaiva nihanmy etāv ity ābhāṣya vaco hariḥ /
GK16simhrsku:571: bhūmes tadābhavad bhāras tad-vaśād api bhāratī /
GK16simhrsku:574: vicitrair aṅga-hāraiś ca helayā sa tadā hariḥ //SRs_1.254//
GK16simhrsku:575: yat tau babandha keśeṣu jātā sā kaiśikī tataḥ /
GK16simhrsku:582: sa eva samayo dhātrā vṛttir ity eva saṃjñitaḥ //SRs_1.258//
GK16simhrsku:583: hariṇā tena yad vastu valigitair yādṛśaṃ kṛtam /
GK16simhrsku:584: tadvad eva kṛtā vṛttir dhātrā tasyāṅga-sambhavā //SRs_1.259//
GK16simhrsku:586: bhāraty-ādyā kramāj jātā ity anye tu pracakṣate //SRs_1.260//
GK16simhrsku:591: sātvatī nāma sā vṛttiḥ proktā lakṣaṇa-kovidaiḥ /
GK16simhrsku:592: aṅgāny asyās tu catvāri saṃlāpottāpakāv api //SRs_1.263//
GK16simhrsku:593: saṅghātyaḥ parivartaś cety eṣāṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate /
GK16simhrsku:596: preraṇaṃ yat parasyādau yuddhāyotthāpakas tu saḥ //SRs_1.265//
GK16simhrsku:598: saṅghasya bhedanaṃ yat tu saṅghātyaḥ sa udāhṛtaḥ //SRs_1.266//
GK16simhrsku:603: aṅgāny asyās tu catvāri narma tat-pūrvakā ime /
GK16simhrsku:604: sphañja-sphoṭau ca garbhaś ca teṣāṃ lakṣaṇam ucyate //SRs_1.269//
GK16simhrsku:606: agrāmyaḥ parihāsas tu narma syāt tat tridhā matam //SRs_1.270//
GK16simhrsku:613: priyāparādha-nirbhedo' py uktas tredhā tathā budhaiḥ /
GK16simhrsku:614: śuddha-hāsyajam apy uktaṃ tadvad eva tridhā budhaiḥ //SRs_1.274//
GK16simhrsku:616: tad dvidhā mukham aṅgaṃ tu tad dvayaṃ pūrvavat tridhā //SRs_1.275//
GK16simhrsku:620: narma-sphoṭas tu bhāvāṃśaiḥ sūcito' lpa-raso bhavet //SRs_1.277//
GK16simhrsku:621: anyais tv akāṇḍe sambhoga-viccheda iti gīyate /
